body:
Many of you may already know that I have gold!


<----------------------------------- :D Like OMG!!!!!


Now due to this gold I think feel like coding a plugin! I am in a slump though. I am very creative but someone put a wall right in the spot to block the tunnel where the cool ideas go for plugins. So I'll use you minds until the wall evaporates. Any plugin ideas my dear friends?


P.S. Sr. Mods+ can you add me too the premium team speak suite? Thanks! :D

replies.body: Plugin that sends the server a resource pack with a song that an in-game player requests to be played and will be played server-wide without any browser/external client. Basically sending a customsong.ogg then if the player accepts the plugin will play customsong.ogg. I had this idea a long time ago. I wish it occurred on Avic I don't like having youtube open in the background.
